title: The Beginning of life (TEFC)
creator_credit: Sveriges radio aktiebolag and Lars Wallen
brief_description: Beginning and ending with sequences showing the birth of a child, the film illustrates the growth of the human embryo from the release of the sperm until the ninth month.
